---
title: "Hansard"
categories: legislation, decision making
---

Hansard, the official report of all Parliamentary debates, [stores all information on debates in Parliament, as far back as 1805.](https://hansard.parliament.uk/)

Historic data is available through the [historic API](https://api.parliament.uk/historic-hansard/api)

Most of this information can be obtained programatically through the [Parliament API](parliament-api.qmd).
